participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Creative and nostalgic, with a love for art and music. Enjoys sharing personal experiences and connecting through food.
participant_1.background: My favorite toy as a child was my Lite-Brite. I take dance lessons once a week and have a fondness for old school hip hop. I was born in the early 80s and have a soft spot for New Kids on the Block.

participant_2.name: Mike
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and laid-back, with a passion for cooking and sports. Enjoys discussing life aspirations and embracing a carefree attitude.
participant_2.background: I am a construction worker. In my free time, I like to watch NASCAR racing and UFC. My favorite food is Mexican food, and I've been working since I was sixteen years old.

content.text: Hello, i am doing well. How are you?
I'm cool! What is your favorite food? my favorite food is mexican food.
I like mexican food. I am a good cook.
nice to have a cook friend! i am a construction worker. What is your favorite food?
I love pizza! I am going to be a chef soon.
I like to cook too. also in my free time i like to watch nascar racing and ufc. can you drive a car?
I do not like to drive. I am a dodge guy.
that's good. I don't like to drive too. It's not for humans, it's for machines and robots because it's more safe.
I think i will make a secret for that
I am not sure what i want to do with my life.
i've been working since i was sixteen years old and always knew that i'm interested in many things. What are you interested in most?
I am going to be a clown, i am a pretty old hippie.
